meanings.definition: The part of the human body between the ribs and the hips.
meanings.sent1: She wrapped a measuring tape around her waist to check her size.
meanings.sent2: His belt was too tight around his waist after a big meal.
meanings.sent3: The waist of the pants decided to take a break and relax.
meanings.sent4: Her waist was a bridge between her upper and lower body, connecting them seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's waist moved gracefully to the rhythm of the music.

meanings.definition: The narrow part of a garment that fits around the waist.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a beautiful ribbon tied around the waist.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the waist of her jeans to make them more comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The waist of the skirt went on strike, demanding better fabric.
meanings.sent4: The waist of the jacket hugged her snugly, keeping her warm.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully measured the waist of the trousers for a perfect fit.
